compatibility.notes: The AGPL-3.0 license is a copyleft license, which means that if you distribute derivative works based on the original work, you must also make the source code available under the same terms.

key_requirements: When using this license, you must assert copyright on the software and offer recipients a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License.
You must provide the source code of the modified version running on a publicly accessible server to the public.
license.name: AGPL-3.0
obligations: The operator of a network server must provide the source code of the modified version running there to the users of that server.
